website_summaries.verdict: The price tag is steep, but this wok's even heat distribution and high temperatures ensure one flawless dish after the next.
pros: A top choice for its powerful, 1,500-watt butterfly element, which ensures even heat distribution
cons: It can be a bit heavy
Owners notice this especially when moving or washing the wok

customer_reviews.title: The next best thing to cooking with a real, cast-iron wok over a sturdy flame
customer_reviews.text: When we left China, I despaired of being able to stir-fry in America. This electric wok gets the job done! It heats well, especially for an electric, and the non-stick surface means I don't have to use quite as much oil as I would in a conventional, cast-iron pan. It's big, it's heavy, the heating element is solid and easy to control, and best of all it comes apart for cleaning. It doesn't get quite as hot nor is it as easy to handle as a cast-iron wok over a good flame -- the way we cooked in China -- but it's the next best thing. Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jerry

customer_reviews.title: I already have one and do love it, It actually gets hot enough 425 degrees ...
customer_reviews.text: ; bought as an early Christmas gift, I already have one and do love it, It actually gets hot enough 425 degrees so that you can fry stuff in it, but also works great as slow cooker. A bit of a pain to detach the bowl from the base for washing, but I just empty, wipe out with paper towels, a bit of soap and hot water rinse and it is ready to go when needed. But I have been very pleased with Breville products
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Another Breville hit
customer_reviews.text: This wok has become my favorite pan in which to cook. Heats rather quickly, reaches high temps (necessary in certain food preps), and is easy to clean. It's what I've come to expect from Breville (although they have had a miss or two). As far as longevity, I have used the pan at least once, usually twice or thrice times per week for the last few months. The bonded anti-stick coating seems to be in good shape, although the center (low point) of the wok is slightly discolored. I will update in a few months regarding the overall condition.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rikard

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Wok Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Note to parents everywhere ... use caution when lending to your kids.. I guarantee they will not return!! I purchased my original wok 4 years ago.. I love the temperature settings, ease of cleaning and multi purpose use... I am a big fan of Breville kitchen products that make cooking fun... look out Bobby Flay.. your going to love this wok!!
customer_reviews.author: carla mannes

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Used this last night. Food cooked beautifully. It was all so easy....no more battles with an uncooperative electric stove....very easy to clean. Just wipe out with damp cloth. I put a couple folded paper towels in the bottom and then put the chord in a gallon plastic food saver bag and placed it on top of the paper towels to store. It is a hefty (yes heavy) large, beautiful wok. It would look fine stored on a countertop but I have no room. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: DianaruTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: I no longer need a stove!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite appliance I own! My wife and I use this to meal prep for our lunches every weak. I love how evenly it heats and that the entire wok heats not just the bottom. It is super easy to clean no matter what I have cooked in it. We stir fry vegetables, rice, and chicken and nothing sticks to this wok!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Chaney

customer_reviews.title: The temperature control & heat distribution is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with this wok! The temperature control & heat distribution is awesome! I read the instructions carefully before using it. My pineapple fried rice & chow mein dishes came out delicious! I’m very impressed that only a little amount of oil was needed; and I didn’t experience anything sticking. Great wok size, easy to use; and cleans up easily! I’m in love with my new wok.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Moore

customer_reviews.title: CHECK THE BOX
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Breville wok 1500W ex Hong Kong Amazon as the power supply is the same as Thailand. Paid USD 259.68 including import tax. On arrival plugged in the wok, which smoked then started to catch fire, after inspection Amazon sent a US Breville wok with different voltage. The cost of returning and then import costs, could have increased the total purchase to USD 350.00 very quickly. Amazon refunded a token import fee deposit of USD19.46 even though the import fee was USD 42.17. Purchased a Sunbeam 2400W better spec for USD 72.00 (not Amazon) all working well. DISAPPOINTED CUSTOMER
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Gleeson

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as a gas range with a wok burner
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because we moved to a new house that has a propane gas range. We tried the gas range first, as our old home had a gas range with a wok burner that got very hot. The propane gas range did not get as hot, so we tried this electric wok. We did not have high expectations, but was surprised that it sears the vegetables really quick and the fried rice tasted just as good. Be sure to let the wok heat up for 10 min before cooking on the sear setting. The clean up was super easy. You will not be disappointed in this product for stir fry.
customer_reviews.author: M. Green

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT WOK - TEFLON LASTED 18 MONTHS.
customer_reviews.text: It was a fantastic wok. Daily use. Teflon (which dies eventually) lasted 18 months. Will be buying again. *Do not use metal utensils.*
customer_reviews.author: Captain Spanky Of Nazareth

customer_reviews.title: Chinese cooking is fun and delicious
customer_reviews.text: After years of frustration trying several different Wok's on our electric range, I finally came to the conclusion you just can't do it. Round bottom, flat bottom, cast iron, stainless, nothing worked. Then I came across this beauty. This is truly a wonder. Sears meats professionally, crisps vegetables, and bubbles a sauce perfectly. Chinese cooking is fun and delicious. I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I use this wok every single day!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this wok that lives on a cutting board on one side of my stove. Use it for eggs, pasta and several asian recipes so far. Can't believe how inexpensive Chicken Fried Rice costs to make at home and no waiting for delivery, no tip and I know for a fact that the local restaurant does not use organic ingredients like I do. Best part is having control over oil quality and sodium levels. Wish I had bought this sexy beauty years ago!
customer_reviews.author: HAPPY MAMA

customer_reviews.title: In love with this wok
customer_reviews.text: I never written a review, but I have to this time. I never own anything that I love this much in my kitchen, this wok is amazing! I cook everything with it, I use it all the time and easy to clean. If you don't like cooking....this wok will change your mind about cooking. I'm more than happy and looking forward to making delicious meal for my family.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: ... the ideal heat and conditions just right for a good stir fry
customer_reviews.text: I have an electric glasstop stove so I'll never get the ideal heat and conditions just right for a good stir fry. This wok is awesome. It heats up quickly and is very very hot, you can disassemble easily to clean it in the sink. It is heavy and sturdily made. I've been eyeing this for a while and the price dropped a little so in the cart it goes! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: 😩

customer_reviews.title: Now my husband wants to cook!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable, good quality product. Holds up to my scrubbing the heck out of it and my husband loves to cook in it for some reason. I'm not going to ask I'm just going to enjoy all the nights I don't have to cook and all the good dinners. This pot heats very evenly and is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: b. Dillon doyle

customer_reviews.title: Only used twice and already has scratches
customer_reviews.text: Cooks very well. However, after only 2 uses the non-stick surface is scratched. This was cooking boneless chicken breast/veggies using a Wooden Spatula and Spoon. NO metal utensils have touched it. This makes me seriously doubt the long term durability of the non-stick coating.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Wok!
customer_reviews.text: It is top notch - a large, deep bowl for cooking, good temperature settings and easy to use and clean. I initially found the locking mechanism connecting the bottom to the base to be difficult to remove, but I quickly learned how to lock them back together. Overall, an excellent product and my stir fry dishes have been outstanding the first couple of times I have used it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This work works beautifully. I like to cook at the 6 or 8 temperature settings, which is lower than the recommended for what I’m cooking, mostly meat and vegetable stir fry, but it turns out great every time! Cooks fast and it’s easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: LNcouch

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I like this even better than my hammered carbon steel wok...which has now been relegated to the patio grill (where it continues to perform superbly). The Breville wok is an absolute joy in the kitchen. It heats quickly to the desired temperature, stir-frys perfectly (with the use of wooden wok utensils), deep-fries, sautees ...and is a breeze to clean. Bravo, Breville!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Highest/sear heat only worked first year...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this wok for a year and a half and it is definitely not as hot as it used to be, for several months now. The warranty ended several months ago and I should have let Breville know about the issue.
customer_reviews.author: aann

customer_reviews.title: Great Wok!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about an electric wok but I no longer had a gas stove so I decided to bite the bullet and try one out. I'm glad I did! This thing is awesome. Quickly heats up, non stick so very easy clean up, actually gets hot enough to sear meat and veggies like a traditional wok. I use this thing at least once a week for stir fry. Very happy buyer!
customer_reviews.author: David Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Quality and large size
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great quality - easy clean up. Only downside is it is so big you need a place to store it - not a downside to me - watch for the right deal, I paid $89.99 for it.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Frye

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome cooking instrument
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome cooking instrument! It is big, if you have the counter top space to leave it up, it is worthy of leaving it out on your counter top. Food cooks fast and the hot wok is versatile. Breakfast lunch or dinner!, it will work. Food cooks fast and clean up is easy. Worth the investment is practical and useful.to cook quick and healthy food. Well, i cooked bacon and its not healthy but that's a part of its versatility :).
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wok
customer_reviews.text: We love this wok! My husband bought this on a kind of whim, stating an electric wok he bought a couple decades ago wouldn't heat up worth a darn. Hoping technological improvements would change over time, he purchased this wok, and it doesn't disappoint! Stir fry is ready in a matter of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Performs amazingly but I doubt the product would last.
customer_reviews.text: While this product is shockingly good at searing and other wok related activities, the cooking surface teflon (or whatever they're calling it) is too soft. It became scratched even though all I used were silicon spatulas. I ended up returning it but will keep the fond memories of the dishes made while I had it.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Oh my! Great addition to the kitchen. Wok cooking requires high heat and this delivers. Read the directions. Learned not to cook too much meat at a time but to do it in 1/2 lb portions. Made a big difference in flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Pam C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cooking Guy
customer_reviews.text: I love this wok. So easy to cook large meals. No sticking food and everything comes out great. Took me a few times to get use to the cook times for various of food that need to be combined at different cook times but once I got the hang of it it’s been great. I never really cooked during my busy career but I really look forward to making cool meals. Happy Cooking Guy😎
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, An Electric Wok That Works
customer_reviews.text: Been searching for a decent electric wok for a decade. Pricey but worth every penny. Stir fries so well the sizzle scares the cats...
customer_reviews.author: Blue Ridge Plumbing

customer_reviews.title: Love this wok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my roommate because she loves Asian cooking. She's been so happy with it because it heats up quickly and evenly. In fact, it cooks so quickly that it took her a few times to get used to how fast you can cook meat in it. What I like the most is clean-up. It's so easy to wash; it even has a mechanism to keep the heating element safe from water. This wok is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: One of my favourite cooking tools!! Easy peasy clean up, lots less spatter than traditional cook top utensils, very versatile for lots of dishes besides stir fry, fast heat up and cool down. This and my electric pressure cooker get the most use in my kitchen. Love it and, like all Breville products, it looks so good on the countertop. Knowing that Breville are built to last I think the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Cazza

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Breville is an awesome brand! I haven’t had the chance to use the wok yet, but I will be very soon! Looks very nice and it is big enough to cool for the family!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Manuel

customer_reviews.title: This wok is heavy. They thought of everything when ...
customer_reviews.text: This wok is heavy. They thought of everything when they designed this product. You can remove the base for cleaning, vented glass lid, heats very quickly, too many other highlights to continue. It's expensive but well worth the price! I believe it will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: OMG this wok is everything you want in a wok - EXCELLENT heat distribution and nice high heat and great size and slope of sides, easy to clean, HEAVY! and anti-skid on the bottom makes it hard to slide into my cabinet but love love love this. Wish I'd bought it years ago
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful Wok. Use it quite often and i does ...
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful Wok. Use it quite often and i does what it is suppose to do. A little heavey but it is well work the money if you enjoy cooking with a Wok
customer_reviews.author: William Jarosz

customer_reviews.title: We already had one and just got this one too ...
customer_reviews.text: We already had one and just got this one too to be able to cook two toppings at the same time. Very reliable and my wife loves it. It gets very hot as a Wok should and immediately stir fries everything perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this WOK
customer_reviews.text: The real deal to prepare Asian Foods and great for other cooking. Best Wok that I have used, helps me to serve wonderful food.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was a splurge for me but I love Breville products and my stove just doesn't get hot ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a splurge for me but I love Breville products and my stove just doesn't get hot enough to make a decent stir-fry. It sits on top of my stove and I use it almost every day. It gets hot enough and easy to adjust to higher or lower temps. LOVE IT. Thanks !
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Simple Woking
customer_reviews.text: Love it - used it a few times before I moved across country. Was so easy to use and clean up a breeze. Packed it away for the movers and now can't find it - boy I miss it.
customer_reviews.author: dan fugitt

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy but well built. The removeable base makes it easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Zak

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Cooks perfectly every time. So easy to clean. Usually just wipe clean with a paper towel. Nothing to dislike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large volume and hot hot hot!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pleased with this wok, much more than a traditional wok used on a cooktop. The heat wraps all around so food cooks quickly, evenly.
customer_reviews.author: amby

customer_reviews.title: breville wok is good for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Cooked several stir fried recipies. Please note that you have to let it get hot. I wait 5 to 7 mins before adding oil. Wait and let it get hottest it can get before starting adding oil. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Ankur

customer_reviews.title: Easier to use than a traditional wok
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product making cooking with a wok simple and cooking temperature more consistent. So easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Collins

customer_reviews.title: BIG wok easy to handle and clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a great WOK...easy to handle and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Pat M

customer_reviews.title: Large electric Wok
customer_reviews.text: Replacing a loved but ancient electric wok. This is a great wok. It heats evenly and it is easy to rinse and wipe out.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: I love the nonstick surface and that it heats all the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the nonstick surface and that it heats all the way up the sides. It also is great for large families!!
customer_reviews.author: SDAKOTA

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: I love this wok! Heats fast and evenly. I had used another brand for years and it finally gave out. This new wok outshines my old one I hope it lasts as long.
customer_reviews.author: Debra McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Wok
customer_reviews.text: Excellent electric wok! Very fast heating. Base separates easily from the wok. Easy cleanup. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great heat distribution
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty wok that heats up fast and has heating elements that go up the sides. Nonstick surface that is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd R. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome WOK.
customer_reviews.text: This electric wok gets hot enough to stir fry correctly and in a short time. It's easy to clean and well made. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dbrady3702

customer_reviews.title: One Hot Wok
customer_reviews.text: This is a no nonsense wok and our 2nd one. In an abundance of caution, we decided to replace our 3 year old one which we will keep as a backup. We can't be without one. Simple as that.
customer_reviews.author: Outta Open a Restaurant

customer_reviews.title: Best Wok for any price.
customer_reviews.text: Tried many woks both electric and non electric. All kinds such as carbon steel, stainless steel etc. This one heats up nicely, maintains the heat and stir frys like it should. Gets very hot to do searing. Non stick coating seems durable and the wok material is very thick so heat is even. Now we use it all the time regularly. One of the party favorite is mongolian stir fry. Saute thin sliced meats and shrimp and add thin sliced veggies with Szechwan, soy and other spicy sauces. Guests went crazy over this and it was different, quick and lot of fun
customer_reviews.author: Elsie

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I just love this wok
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I just love this wok! Very nice size and heats up fast and hot! Perfect! So glad we chose this one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Wok
customer_reviews.text: Heats up much quicker than instructions say, works great, doesn't take up a burner on the stove, and produces MUCH less heat for cooking inside during the summer.
customer_reviews.author: OneMansOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Replace old wok no comparison this wok is super heavy duty should last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Gary Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Easy to use. I wok cooked for the first time and it came out great. It is bulky and kind of hard to wash and store.
customer_reviews.author: WarBucks

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: What a great product you don't need a stove can even cook eggs
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cargill Martek

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Breville never disappoints.
customer_reviews.text: Great even heat distribution. Removable cook area from base makes cleaning easy.
customer_reviews.author: JJK

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Use it quite a bit. Not a true Wok, but excellent for an electric one. Easy clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer oldbear yp

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dented!!
customer_reviews.text: My wok arrived today. I was really excited to open it and start using it. I had dinner planned and everything. Expect fail! Can’t do that because as you can see there is a dent!!
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: It provides excellent and uniform heat
customer_reviews.text: The Wok works as advertised. It provides excellent and uniform heat. It is large and heavy. No complaints. I hand wash it so I can't comment on how the base detaches for using a dishwasher to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!! I loved it until the coating  started peeling off !!
customer_reviews.text: Updated review I have had this wok for about 8 months and the coating has bubbled up and is peeling off So I have had this wok for a few weeks. I have used it every day since I've gotten it. It is awesome:) It heats up quick, stays hot and is very easy to clean. You basically just need to wipe it out. I have made stirfry's, soups stews and even healthy egg white omelettes. Nothing sticks:) Everything cooks through and fast, the vegetable stay nice and crunchy. I highly recommend this wok:)
customer_reviews.author: Shosh from The Art Corner

customer_reviews.title: Very nice heavy duty wok
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavy duty wok. It is a Cadillac Wok with a durable non stick surface. a Well built appliance, the Breville Wok! As many other Breville products, it is Guarantee the longevity! I love it, it is sitting in my slab counter.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Big and handy
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Its gigantic but the best I could fine when it comes to electric woks.
customer_reviews.author: Stan10

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this wok every week it does a great job! Stir frying vegetables with chicken with this is so simple. Nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT wok!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this wok for several years. Previously bought different cheaper electric woks but none could achieve the high temperature to cook Asian foods. I bought another for vacation home. The wok is well made, but heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Koppel

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with an electric wok---and I am so impressed. The first thing you notice is how large and sturdy it is. It heats quickly--sears meat beautifully. The temperature control is so easy to operate. Every meal I have made with the Hot Wok has been delicious! You won't be sorry if you splurge for this!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: It is Better
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous wok that does make a difference with Breville sturdyness and quality. Replaced a much cheaper one that through heavy usage was loosing the non-stick coating.
customer_reviews.author: Lee A Bates

customer_reviews.title: Nothing bad to say about it
customer_reviews.text: Heats all the way up the sides. Nothing bad to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Teflon film is fragile
customer_reviews.text: Works good, but the Teflon film is fragile. Spoon gentle touch induce obvious scratch mark.
customer_reviews.author: Shuhai Fan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wok!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, gets VERY hot very quick - makes excellent stir fry. The non-stick coating was a disappointment - we were very careful to use soft bamboo tools but it still scratched the first time we used it. However we still think it will hold up well and otherwise this thing is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: HSHOBX

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: I do not have a gas stove so I was looking for an electric wok that would sear well at high temps. This fits the bill and was worth every penny. Only drawback is what others have said that you cannot detach it from the base while you are cooking or while it has any food in it so it is cumbersome to get food out at times. Everything else about this wok is top quality and easy to use and clean. Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: MicheleD

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of woks over the years but this one is the best! Heats quickly, cooks beautifully, cleans easily. I thought I was nuts to spend as much as I did on this, but it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great wok, super easy to clean; just be careful with the non-scratch surface.
customer_reviews.text: Love this wok! Gets so hot very quickly and easy to disassemble and clean. Only complaint is the non-stick surface is fairly easy to scratch and I am careful to use only wooden or bamboo utensils in it. It is worth the money! I had a second, cheaper wok which I threw in the trash after using this one once. Don’t waste time buying a cheaper one. This is the real deal!
customer_reviews.author: Stacia H. Goldey

customer_reviews.title: but this Breville electric wok is one fine countertop appliance that no good chef should be without
customer_reviews.text: A wok's a wok, but this Breville electric wok is one fine countertop appliance that no good chef should be without. I use it for preparing Chinese dishes as well as brewing gravies and sauces. The infinite temperature control puts all the "cooking control" at your fingertips! Pedestal easily separates from the wok bowl for easy cleaning - reassembly is a snap for me, but I've read where some people have experienced difficulty with the reassembly process??? Power cord is heavy duty and includes the Breville "finger loop" at the plug end for easy extraction from the electrical outlet. Buy with confidence ... it's heavy and sturdy on the countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Aldocella

customer_reviews.title: It’s a perfect wok
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect wok for both craftsmanship and functionality!
customer_reviews.author: Wm. D. Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Love the wok
customer_reviews.text: This wok is amazing. Heats fast and cooks evenly. Easy clean up and lightweight but extremely durable. Certainly worth the money. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly and as described. The nonstick surface needs little to no oil.
customer_reviews.author: damrpapa11

customer_reviews.title: It comes apart easily and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: It does distributes the heat well. It is heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Scharninghausen

customer_reviews.title: Great Wok at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have used this Wok now a few times and if you are like me and don't have a gas stove, this is the next best thing to using a wok with gas, It gets very hot which is essential when using a wok and cooks evenly, It is very sturdy and super easy to clean. I highly recommend, I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I can finally cook Chinese recipes without ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I can finally cook Chinese recipes without a panfull of juices to ruin the dish. It sears the meat, chicken etc. in a flash to keep all those juices in the meat and not in the bottom of the pan.
customer_reviews.author: scrumbles

customer_reviews.title: Fast cooking wok
customer_reviews.text: Love this wok. Perfect for a nice family dinner with different food variations
customer_reviews.author: Schwabe

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, powerful, easy cleanup-- this is THE wok to get
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful, good non-stick surface, easy cleanup-- can put all parts in the dishwasher. This is THE electric wok to get. You will find yourself using it more than most of you other appliances. Tasks like scrambling eggs and browning meat are better done in this wok than traditional stove-top methods.
customer_reviews.author: FrodoB

customer_reviews.title: A kitchen must have
customer_reviews.text: Awesome appliance for any Asian cooking lover , quick wear and great for stir fry or your favorite Pad Thai ..
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. Makes a huge difference. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E

customer_reviews.title: A must add for your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I use it several times a week and it’s easy to clean up and food comes out perfect everytime.
customer_reviews.author: Dan H

customer_reviews.title: This wok works great. Really high heat
customer_reviews.text: This wok works great. Really high heat. It is easy to clean. It is big if you are tight on storage space.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Best buy of the year!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I’ve made in a long time! Very well made. Heats evenly and gets the sear perfectly. I love how easy it is to take apart from the base and wash. I have been just leaving it on my counter and stir frying several times a week. Makes eating my veggies easy and fun! A great buy and absolutely worth the price. It also came within two days!
customer_reviews.author: ZAP

customer_reviews.title: Breville Taking over Kitchen-Aid
customer_reviews.text: Great product, in fact most of my small kitchen appliances are now Breville: solid construction, easy to use, and good customer service. I have switched all of my small appliances from the Kitchen-Aid Professional series to Breville. The Wok is a must have if you have kids because you can pretty do everything in it and the temperature control is "accurate". I would not hesitate to recommend to those who follow product reviews like myself. One tip, research, research research the price, there is always a deal on amazon.com Best T.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Best wok ever
customer_reviews.text: Best wok ever. Nothing sticks. Hardly have to use oil. Total game changer for stir fry. Clean up is so easy.
customer_reviews.author: gorditer

customer_reviews.title: Loved truly non-stick properties
customer_reviews.text: Loved truly non-stick properties. Wok heats up well to required heat. Easy access to each nook and cranny for cleaning. Sturdy base can be easily removed for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: gwendoline alexander

customer_reviews.title: Second coming
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Breville and I love them both. We have two homes and now both of them have a Breville.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Otten

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, I use it to even fry eggs
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, I use it to even fry eggs. Hot, heats on the sides, "everlasting" durability. I did not make a mistake with this purchase. Got a second one for my brother for Christmas. I have not used other electric Woks, but I don't know how one could get better.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E Parker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The weight keeps the wok stable when stirring food around.
customer_reviews.author: Ina C. Wiser

customer_reviews.title: EzE healthy meals
customer_reviews.text: This wok exceeded my expectations! A big help in making healthy carefree meals.Well made all around product, like that it comes apart and can be placed in the dishwasher. Heat stays even all around cooking space.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Luciano

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love! awesome piece of cookware, don't know how I lived without it!
customer_reviews.author: Regina Laessle

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Since I don't have a stove this ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Since I don't have a stove this is the best to stir fry all of my veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This wok works very well. It takes a litle ...
customer_reviews.text: This wok works very well. It takes a litle adjustment to get used to the numbering heat system but that is OK. My one issue with it is that it is very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... stir fry - I cannot believe how much I love this wok
customer_reviews.text: From a family who loves to eat and make stir fry - I cannot believe how much I love this wok! Great quality, easy to clean. Love the glass lid to see while cooking. Very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' it!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am VERY happy with quality of this appliance. Very sturdy and well-made. I've only cooked in it 3 times and but it has performed well. I just need to experiment more to see what all it can do. Easy clean-up too!
customer_reviews.author: meesh

product_meta.title: Breville BEW600XL Hot Wok
product_meta.description: Similar to cooking on a gas stove, the unique 1500 Watt Butterfly Element of the Hot Wok distributes heat evenly up the walls of the wok, maximizing high-heat searing potential. The heat-responsive aluminum layers maintain this high heat to sear food, sealing in moisture. 15 precision heat settings to 425 F emulate authentic Asian-style cooking.
feature_bullets: Stainless steel base / Die cast wok bowl with Quantanium non stick
1500W butterfly heating element heats up to 425ºF with 15 precision heat settings.
